SEARCH
Package laborator_2.homework

Class ProblemInstance

java.lang.Object
laborator_2.homework.ProblemInstance
public class ProblemInstance extends Object
The ProblemInstance class represents an instance of the problem and contains a list of locations and paths between them.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProblemInstance

      public ProblemInstance()
      The default constructor of the ProblemInstance class. Initializes the location and path lists with an empty list.

    • getLocations

      public static ArrayList<Location> getLocations()
      Returns the list of problem locations.

      public static void addRoad(Road road)

    • getRoads

      public static ArrayList<Road> getRoads()
      Returns the list of problem roads.
      Returns:

    • getInstance

      public static ProblemInstance getInstance()
      Returns the unique instance of the problem. If an instance does not already exist, it creates one.
      Returns:
      The unique instance of the problem.

    • canTravelBetween

      public static String canTravelBetween(Location start, Location end)
      Determines if it is possible to travel between two locations. Uses breadth-first search to find if a path exists.
      Parameters:
      start - the starting location
      end - the destination location
      Returns:
      a message indicating whether a path exists between the locations
